name: VaccineLedger
description: A supply chain optimization platform that ensure quality, safety and fair distribution of COVID-19 and other vaccines
SDGevidence:
Indian Express article about our pilot with an Indian Government to use VaccineLedger to ensure quality safety and fair distribution of COVID-19 drugs, vaccines and other related products. This is achieved by the platform by using blockchain technology to track and trace these products from manufacturer to consumers. 

https://www.newindianexpress.com/states/telangana/2020/sep/28/telanganato-combat-black-marketing-of-covid-19-vaccine-via-blockchain-2202846.html

World Economic Forum's article on VaccineLedger and the use cases it is solving with COVID-19 vaccine distribution. 

https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2020/07/blockchain-role-in-distributing-covid-19-vaccine-could-make-history/
